TabPage.Condition: GetConfigParm("QER\ComplianceCheck") = "1" and from personwantsorg select current canseenoncompliance

Column.Name: CanSeeNonCompliance
Column.Expression:
CanSeeAllNonCompliance() or
( IsAllManager() and -- check if the WhereClause for VI_4_ALLMANAGER on PersonInNonCompliance matches exists("Person", variable(format("exists (select top 1 1 from dbo.QER_FTHelperHeadOrgChildren('%UserUID%') c where exists ( select top 1 1 from HelperPersonOrg h1 where h1.UID_Org = c.UID_Org and h1.UID_Person = {0} union all select top 1 1 from PersonInBaseTree h1 where h1.UID_Org = c.UID_Org and h1.UID_Person = {0} ) ) or exists (select top 1 1 from HelperHeadPerson hhp where hhp.UID_PersonHead ='%UserUID%' and hhp.XOrigin > 0 and hhp.UID_Person = {0} )", SqlFormatValue(uid_personordered, "string", "NonUnicodeLiterals")))))

Function.Name: CanSeeAllNonCompliance()
